response.overview: A series of mainly mecha and some character scenes from Macross "TV On Air Version" set to Macross background music and Lynn Minmay songs. The video includes an unbroadcasted version of the opening title sequence without the actual printed credits, as well as the first ending title sequence (of Hikaru's sunset-lit racer) with the printed credits and the second ending title sequences without them.
response.title: Macross Mecha Graffitti
